description: Welcome home to Farrow Ridge a boutique collection of homes in the heart of Coquitlam! This 3 bedroom & 2 bathroom home has everything done for you already! Gorgeous kitchen with quartz countertops & stainless steel appliances. Open concept living with high ceilings offering tons of natural light, laminate flooring, newer blinds & paint. Enjoy the outdoor rooftop patio space with a rooftop patio that has mountain views & a balcony off the living room. Location, location, location! Conveniently located close to SkyTrain, shopping, groceries, schools, parks, trails, Lougheed Mall, recreation, SFU & Highway 1. Secured parking, storage & insuite laundry included. Pet & rental friendly community!
